SEARCH
Module com.example.demo
Package com.example.demo.screens

Class MenuScreen

java.lang.Object
com.example.demo.screens.MenuScreen
Direct Known Subclasses:
GameLoseScreen, GameWinScreen, MainMenu
public abstract class MenuScreen extends Object
Represents a base class for menu screens in the game. This class provides common functionality for managing screen layout, background setup, button styles, and disabling default button key behaviors.

  • Constructor Details

    • MenuScreen

      public MenuScreen(double width, double height, String backgroundImage)
      Constructs a MenuScreen with the specified width, height, and background image.
      Parameters:
      width - The width of the screen.
      height - The height of the screen.
      backgroundImage - The path to the background image resource.

  • Method Details

    • initializeBackground

      protected void initializeBackground(String backgroundPath)
      Initializes the background of the menu screen with the specified image. If the image is not found, the screen defaults to a dark blue color.
      Parameters:
      backgroundPath - The path to the background image resource.

    • disableButtonDefaultKeyBehavior

      protected void disableButtonDefaultKeyBehavior(javafx.scene.control.Button button)
      Disables default key behavior (e.g., SPACE and ENTER) for the specified button. Prevents accidental activation of button actions through key presses.
      Parameters:
      button - The button to modify.

    • createStyledButton

      protected javafx.scene.control.Button createStyledButton(String text)
      Creates a styled button with predefined styles and effects. Includes hover effects and a gradient background.
      Parameters:
      text - The text to display on the button.
      Returns:
      A styled Button instance.

    • getScene

      public javafx.scene.Scene getScene()
      Retrieves the Scene associated with this MenuScreen.
      Returns:
      The Scene object representing this screen.

    • createScreen

      protected abstract void createScreen()
      Abstract method to be implemented by subclasses to create and set up the menu screen.
